attributes.action: ask universities to waive fees for part time degrees for the jobless
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hi
I am a Communications Specialist who is now jobless due to the economic downturn.

i want to do a BSc in International Relations in order to improve my chances of finding work.

Cannot afford the fees - even the application handling fee of 56 pounds sterling with the University of London External scheme so that they can consider my application.

Pls help- if not with the full fees, then at least with partial fees.

sincerely

Sabina Atta
